headline.main: PARENTS/CHILDREN; Prevention of Heart Disease Can Start in Childhood

docs.abstract: Research finding high cholesterol in very young Amer children prompts med experts to urge diet control and development of proper food habits for adulthood; Drs C J Glueck and William P Castelli advise parents on good eating patterns (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Parents may have it in their power to help their children avoid an early death from heart disease, a disease that remains epidemic in this country, with heart attacks killing more than 600,000 people a year.
docs.snippet: Parents may have it in their power to help their children avoid an early death from heart disease, a disease that remains epidemic in this country, with heart attacks killing more than 600,000 people a year.

headline.main: The Liquid Protein Diet Controversy; The Liquid Protein Diet: This Year's Controversy

docs.abstract: Article on controversial liquid-protein diet advocated in Dr Robert Linn bk The Last Chance Diet; illus (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: SOME HAVE hailed it as a breakthrough in the battle against obesity. Others say it is no more than a transient gimmick that will pass into obscurity before 1978.
docs.snippet: SOME HAVE hailed it as a breakthrough in the battle against obesity. Others say it is no more than a transient gimmick that will pass into obscurity before 1978.

headline.main: Medical Society Committee Asks Curb on Cancer-Causing Pollution

byline.original: By DONALD JANSON Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: NJ Med Soc com urges reduced air pollution, citing potential for causing cancer, soc conv, Atlantic City (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, May 16 A committee of the Medical Society of New Jersey urged action today to reduce air pollution in the state because of its potential for causing cancer.
docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, May 16 A committee of the Medical Society of New Jersey urged action today to reduce air pollution in the state because of its potential for causing cancer.
